mdRecord.dcterms:description: One graffiti questions whether or not the author is smart enough to be at UVA; another responds reassuringly, yes. Unattributed lines from John Keats "Ode to a Grecian Urn." [work]
Student graffiti art and messages inscribed on carrel walls in the new stacks, Alderman Library, University of Virginia, prior to the renovation of the building, 2020-2023. [host]
